_sText:
CS_OFFICE2008pro is the LAST VERSION and FINAL of this MAP available here http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/51524 CS_OFFICE2008 customized by aka_theshark_fr Studio Illuminati_Mapping "At First ... Vmex is good to learn, NOT to steel."

Cs_office2008 Counter-Strike Source
envoyé par akathesharkfr
BACKGROUND: Everybody likes CS_OFFICE, and I thought that for the FUN of EVERYONE... It would be cool to give a new look to this great map... I heard on servers that everybody was a bit tired of the legendary "plaster/offwllc" so I hope you will enjoy the "renovations" (sorry i'm french). CUSTOMISATION: - FPS and etc: VERY GOOD ... try it you'll love it !!!! I begun the work with a cs_office.vmf file found on the web in fact I did'nt used Vmex... But Anyway had very poor fps and an endless time of compiling. I promise people try yourself to use a vmex vmf of a css original map and you'll see the crap result . I have to play The DOCTOR lol to have something can start begin to work with. Lights.. props .. the skybox etc ( the skybox was a road to hell) ... AT first try I had very low fps... NOw ... The Map is Really FAST ! and my PC is prehistorical ^^ - Ambiance I really tried my best not to modify cs_office the wrong way guys :( . as you can see i did 'nt try to build some kind of new stupid ways into the map ! I JUST tried to make something that will look a little bit more " A LA MODE " like we are saying in france lol ! About the outside places . The lights are bright enough so you can see the enemy. no problem ^^ - Materials Hope you will like my "redluxwood" texture The wood is a bit shiny and luxious. The black board texture. If you use it You"ll see "security archives, etc etc" many names you don't see in the map. Please use it !! - Radar: Don't know if you like it but I changed the colours of the radar style ! ( grey ingame ) ( blue when dead) CREDITS: - RAFIK department of defense texture and The illuminati logo texture. - [DNv]Cross ...white corridor texture. I Love it !! - Chizbone Thx for the Perfect nav file ! - skybox texture sky_starfield found on fps banana some month ago thx to the author .. but the file seems to had been erase . :( ( can't find back his name ) - PatriotMaudit testing and camp debunking - aos SEAL aka predulus My master in mapping ^^ !!!! OF COURSE THE ORIGINAL AUTHORs OF CS_OFFICE. !!! Source Version by Turtle Rock Studios Original Version by Hobbit Respect and THX to them .
